xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content: admin.licenses=Licenses admin.licenses.description=View the list of installed extensions that require a license. Set the license owner. Buy licenses for paid extensions or get trial licenses to test them. Check for license updates. Configure automatic upgrades for licensed extensions. licensor.name=Extension Name licensor.version=Version licensor.status=Expiration Date licensor.status.noLicenseAvailable=No license available licensor.status.infinite=Infinite licensor.support=Support licensor.support.unspecified=- licensor.support.bronze=Bronze licensor.support.silver=Silver licensor.support.gold=Gold licensor.support.platinum=Platinum licensor.userLimit=User Limit licensor.userLimit.unspecified=- licensor.userLimit.unlimited=Unlimited licensor.wiki=Wikis licensor.wiki.installedOnFarm=Installed on Farm licensor.actions=Actions licensor.moreActions.autoUpgrade.allow=Allow automatic version upgrade licensor.moreActions.autoUpgrade.label=Auto Upgrade licensor.moreActions.autoUpgrade.prevent=Prevent automatic version upgrade licensor.moreActions.autoUpgrade.removed=Removed from the list of auto-upgraded extensions licensor.moreActions.autoUpgrade.added=Added to the list of auto-upgraded extensions licensor.trialLicense.label=Get Trial licensor.extendTrialLicense.label=Extend Trial licensor.extendPaidLicense.label=Extend License licensor.paidLicense.label=Buy licensor.addLicense.adding=Adding license... licensor.addLicense.success=License successfully added! licensor.addLicense.denied=Failed! You need administration right to add a license. licensor.addLicense.error=Failed! The provided license could not be decoded. Please contact sales@xwiki.com. licensor.addLicense.nonJSON=Unexpected error: Received non-JSON content. Please contact sales@xwiki.com. licensor.addLicense.gettingTrialLicense=Getting trial license... licensor.addLicense.useless=Failed! License is not compatible or useful for your server. Please contact sales@xwiki.com licensor.addLicense.heading=Add License licensor.addLicense.hint=If you already have a license, copy it here to activate the extension(s) it's associated with. licensor.ownerDetails.firstName.label=First name licensor.ownerDetails.lastName.label=Last name licensor.ownerDetails.email.label=Email licensor.ownerDetails.email.hint=You will use this email address to contact the support, so make sure it is valid. licensor.ownerDetails.instanceId.label=Instance id licensor.ownerDetails.instanceId.hint=Unique identifier for your XWiki instance. Used to associate your licenses with your XWiki instance. licensor.ownerDetails.missingData=This field is required! licensor.ownerDetails.heading=License Ownership licensor.ownerDetails.hint=Fill in the following fields in order to buy a license or to get a trial one. licensor.licenseManager.heading=Licensed Extensions licensor.licenseManager.hint=Here's a list of extensions installed in your wiki that require a license to be activated. You can buy a license or get a 10-day trial license that can be extended only once with 10 days. A license covers all versions of the licensed extension and is shared by the main wiki and all its subwikis. A licensed extension is listed multiple times if different versions are installed on different subwikis, but all those versions will share the same license. For each extension you can also enable the automatic upgrade to the lastest available stable version. licensor.missingLicenses=The following extensions do not have a valid license. Please visit the {0}Licenses section{1}. licensor.missingLicense.info=There is no valid license for {0}. Please visit the {1}. licensor.missingLicense.label=Licenses section licensor.notification.autoUpgrade.done=Upgraded {0} from version {1} to {2} licensor.notification.autoUpgrade.done.description=An extension was upgraded automatically licensor.notification.autoUpgrade.failed=Error while upgrading {0} from version {1} to {2} licensor.notification.autoUpgrade.failed.description=An extension failed to be upgraded automatically licensor.notification.autoUpgrade.plural=Upgrade to the last compatible version has been attempted for multiple extensions licensor.notification.autoUpgrade.singular=Upgrade to the last compatible version has been attempted for an extension licensor.notification.autoUpgrade.type=Automatic upgrades licensor.notification.newVersion.description=A new version is available for a licensed extension. This can be disabled also by enabling automatic upgrades for a certain extension licensor.notification.newVersion.name=New extension version available licensor.notification.newVersion.plural=New versions available for multiple extensions licensor.notification.newVersion.singular=New version available for an extension licensor.accessDenied=Only the administrators with programming rights are allowed to manage the licenses. licensor.unavailableOnSubWiki=The licenses are managed from {0}the main wiki{1}. licensor.updateLicenses.label=Check for License Updates licensor.updateLicenses.hint=Check if the store has license updates and apply them licensor.updateLicenses.hint.title=Payment completed? licensor.updateLicenses.hint.content=Click here to download and apply the license you purchased. licensor.updateLicenses.checking=Checking... licensor.updateLicenses.failedToRetrieve=Failed to retrieve the license updates. licensor.updateLicenses.noUpdates=The licenses are already up-to-date. licensor.updateLicenses.applied=Applied {0} out of {1} license updates. licensor.badCSRFToken=Bad CSRF token licensor.addLicense.submit=Add License licensor.wrongDisplayedContent=This page is not properly displayed because the following extensions do not have a valid license: {0}. Please visit the {1}Licenses section{2}.
